016package io.micronaut.maven.services;
017
018import io.micronaut.core.util.StringUtils;
019import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
020import org.apache.maven.model.Plugin;
021import org.apache.maven.model.PluginExecution;
022import org.apache.maven.plugin.BuildPluginManager;
023import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
024import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
025import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.DefaultInvocationRequest;
026import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.InvocationRequest;
027import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.InvocationResult;
028import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.Invoker;
029import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.MavenInvocationException;
030import org.codehaus.plexus.util.xml.Xpp3Dom;
031import org.slf4j.Logger;
032import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
033import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
034
035import javax.inject.Inject;
036import javax.inject.Singleton;
037import java.io.File;
038import java.util.Arrays;
039import java.util.Optional;
040import java.util.Properties;
041import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference;
042
043import static io.micronaut.maven.testresources.TestResourcesConfiguration.TEST_RESOURCES_ENABLED_PROPERTY;
044import static org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor.*;
045
046/**
047 * Provides methods to execute goals on the current project.
048 *
049 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
050 * @since 1.1
051 */
052@Singleton
053public class ExecutorService {
054
055    private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ExecutorService.class);
056
057    private final MojoExecutor.ExecutionEnvironment executionEnvironment;
058    private final MavenProject mavenProject;
059    private final MavenSession mavenSession;
060    private final Invoker invoker;
061
062    @SuppressWarnings("CdiInjectionPointsInspection")
063    @Inject
064    public ExecutorService(MavenProject mavenProject, MavenSession mavenSession, BuildPluginManager pluginManager,
065                           Invoker invoker) {
066        this.executionEnvironment = executionEnvironment(mavenProject, mavenSession, pluginManager);
067        this.mavenProject = mavenProject;
068        this.mavenSession = mavenSession;
069        this.invoker = invoker;
070    }
071
072    /**
073     * Executes the given goal from the given plugin coordinates.
074     *
075     * @param pluginKey The plugin coordinates in the format groupId:artifactId:version
076     * @param goal The goal to execute
077     * @throws MojoExecutionException If the goal execution fails
078     */
079    public void executeGoal(String pluginKey, String goal) throws MojoExecutionException {
080        final Plugin plugin = mavenProject.getPlugin(pluginKey);
081        if (plugin != null) {
082            AtomicReference<String> executionId = new AtomicReference<>(goal);
083            if (goal != null && goal.indexOf('#') > -1) {
084                int pos = goal.indexOf('#');
085                executionId.set(goal.substring(pos + 1));
086                goal = goal.substring(0, pos);
087            }
088            Optional<PluginExecution> execution = plugin
089                    .getExecutions()
090                    .stream()
091                    .filter(e -> e.getId().equals(executionId.get()))
092                    .findFirst();
093            Xpp3Dom configuration;
094            if (execution.isPresent()) {
095                configuration = (Xpp3Dom) execution.get().getConfiguration();
096            } else if (plugin.getConfiguration() != null) {
097                configuration = (Xpp3Dom) plugin.getConfiguration();
098            } else {
099                configuration = configuration();
100            }
101            executeMojo(plugin, goal(goal), configuration, executionEnvironment);
102        } else {
103            throw new MojoExecutionException("Plugin not found: " + pluginKey);
104        }
105    }
106
107    /**
108     * Executes a goal using the given arguments.
109     *
110     * @param pluginGroup plugin group id
111     * @param pluginArtifact plugin artifact id
112     * @param pluginVersion plugin version
113     * @param goal goal to execute
114     * @param configuration configuration for the goal
115     * @throws MojoExecutionException if the goal execution fails
116     */
117    public void executeGoal(String pluginGroup, String pluginArtifact, String pluginVersion, String goal, Xpp3Dom configuration) throws MojoExecutionException {
118        final Plugin plugin = plugin(pluginGroup, pluginArtifact, pluginVersion);
119        executeMojo(plugin, goal(goal), configuration, executionEnvironment);
120    }
121
122    /**
123     * Executes a goal using the Maven shared invoker.
124     * @param pluginKey The plugin coordinates in the format groupId:artifactId
125     * @param goal The goal to execute
126     * @return The result of the invocation
127     * @throws MavenInvocationException If the goal execution fails
128     */
129    public InvocationResult invokeGoal(String pluginKey, String goal) throws MavenInvocationException {
130        return invokeGoals(pluginKey + ":" + goal);
131    }
132
133    /**
134     * Executes a goal using the Maven shared invoker.
135     * @param goals The goals to execute
136     * @return The result of the invocation
137     * @throws MavenInvocationException If the goal execution fails
138     */
139    public InvocationResult invokeGoals(String... goals) throws MavenInvocationException {
140        InvocationRequest request = new DefaultInvocationRequest();
141        request.setPomFile(mavenProject.getFile());
142        File settingsFile = mavenSession.getRequest().getUserSettingsFile();
143        if (settingsFile.exists()) {
144            request.setUserSettingsFile(settingsFile);
145        }
146        Properties properties = new Properties();
147        properties.put(TEST_RESOURCES_ENABLED_PROPERTY, StringUtils.FALSE);
148
149        request.setLocalRepositoryDirectory(new File(mavenSession.getLocalRepository().getBasedir()));
150        request.addArgs(Arrays.asList(goals));
151        request.setBatchMode(true);
152        request.setQuiet(true);
153        request.setErrorHandler(LOG::error);
154        request.setOutputHandler(LOG::info);
155        request.setProperties(properties);
156        return invoker.execute(request);
157    }
158}
